definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Would you recommend others to use Shiseido product?
sentences.chinese: 您會推薦朋友使用資生堂的彩妝品嗎？

sentences.english: What is the average amount on purchasing the make-up products in Shiseido each month?
sentences.chinese: 平均一個月花多少錢在購買資生堂彩妝品上？

sentences.english: To make use of the consistent bonus point system of Shiseido.
sentences.chinese: 使用資生堂產品一貫的積分制服務。
我使用的是資生堂睫毛夾。

sentences.english: At Shiseido, Japan’s biggest cosmetics maker, sales in China have doubled over the past five years.
sentences.chinese: 資生堂對華銷售額在過去五年翻了一倍。

sentences.english: How often do you buy the make-up products in Shiseido?
sentences.chinese: 平均多久一次會在資生堂購買彩妝品？

definition: sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
